mapper.insert: insert into `cl_borrow_main` (id, user_id, order_no, amount, real_amount, fee, create_time, time_limit, state, borrow_type, card_id, client, address, coordinate, remark, audit_name, audit_time, template_info, loan_time, repay_time, sys_user_id, sys_user_name, sys_create_time, channel_id, ip) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{realAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{timeLimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{borrowType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{client,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coordinate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{templateInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loanTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{repayTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sysUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sysUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARBINARY})

mapper.select:
SELECT cbm.*, cubi.real_name, cubi.id_no, cubi.state as back_state, cubi.black_reason, cu.register_client, cu.channel_id, cu.login_name FROM cl_borrow_main cbm LEFT JOIN cl_user_base_info cubi ON cbm.user_id = cubi.user_id LEFT JOIN cl_user cu ON cubi.user_id = cu.id
ORDER BY cbm.id DESC
select bc.bank,bc.card_no,t.* from cl_borrow_main t LEFT JOIN cl_bank_card bc ON bc.id=t.card_id AND t.user_id=bc.user_id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update:
